question: Which country is to host 11th annual summit of BRICS-2019?
explanation: The 11th annual summit of BRICS will took place from November 13 to 14 in Brasilia, Brazil.The 2019 Brazilian Presidency focuses on the theme, \'BRICS: Economic Growth for an Innovative Future\'. The BRICS comprises Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa. BRICS headquarter is situated at Shanghai, China. The BRICS countries act as one to promote a more legitimate international system, including advocating reform of the UN Security Council.
